import sys
input = lambda: sys.stdin.readline().rstrip("\r\n")
a = [0]*(10**5)
for i in range(len(a)):
    a[i] = a[i-1]+ (i*i)
for _ in range(int(input())):
    k = int(input())
    print(a[k-1])

arr=[0]*10000
for i in range(1,10000):
    arr[i]=arr[i-1]+(i*i)

t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n=int(input())
    print(arr[n-1])

size = 10**4+1
dp = [0 for x in range(size)]
for i in range(1,size):
    dp[i] = dp[i-1]+i*i
#print(dp)
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    num = int(input())
    print(dp[num-1])

from sys import*
input=stdin.readline
